trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Portsmouth
There were no other sightings in Portsmouth on or around December 3rd 2012
Summary: Looked out window and seen somthing in the sky
divs: sighting detailswoke up at 5 or 6 am and then started watching tv and using my computer. it was 7 am and opend my bedroom window for fresh air. i sat down and then thought id put the fan in the window. when i got up i grabed the fan and went to the window and seen the object. i only noticed it because it was moving and thougt it was a plaine.. but i noticed really fast that it wasint a plaine because it was red\orange color. i never seen anything like it befor and knew i had to get it on camera. my camera is right by my computer so it was only a second to grab. i started recording and as soon as i picked the camra up and zoomed in there was a bunch of birds. i noticed that it moved twice as fast as the clouds did and it looks like its trailing somthing but i am unsure. i stoped recording and lost track of it behind a building right after. all i can say is that it was weird and would like to know what it was.
